Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you control a man's thinking you do not have to worry about his actions

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not afraid of being sued by white businessmen. In fact, I should welcome such a law suit

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: Let us banish fear

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a radical

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: I am ready to act, if I can find brave men to help me

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: The mere imparting of information is not education

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: Even schools for Negroes, then, are places where they must be convinced of their inferiority

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: Our most widely known scholars have been trained in universities outside of the South

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: One can cite cases of Negroes who opposed emancipation and denounced the abolitionists

Quote.Author: Carter G. Woodson
Quote.QuoteValue: In fact, the confidence of the people is worth more than money

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the semantics of mini-series for a network is that it has an end

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I do want to direct a movie from horseback one day

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom loved the old black-and-white films

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: You work with the communities to make films. And you just don't go in and take over their territory

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really put trophies out. I don't keep trophies around my apartment

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: My ideas tend to be either really big in terms of like, the logistics, or really small

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm definitely sensitive to the idea of exploitation. You don't want to glamorize certain things

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: 'True Detective' would not pass The Bechdel Test

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't grow up watching detective shows. I've never even seen an episode of 'CSI.'

Quote.Author: Cary Fukunaga
Quote.QuoteValue: After 'Sin Nombre,' I just needed to take a break to go to completely different worlds

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: Keep your feet on the ground and keep reaching for the stars

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: Always be consistent

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: My agent said that I was one of the top three busiest people in the country

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: If the beat gets to the audience, and the message touches them, you've got a hit

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: But otherwise, music is about a beat and a message

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: Anytime in radio that you can reach somebody on an emotional level, you're really connecting

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: My first commercial was for Miller High Life beer

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: Interestingly, songs used to be short, then they became longer, and now they're getting shorter

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: I must have done about 25,000 promos

Quote.Author: Casey Kasem
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the storytelling and reading the letters, the long-distance dedications

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought of myself as an amateur stunt man

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: Persistence and endurance will make you omnipotent

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: Truth is so much more interesting than the fiction we're used to

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: Almost everything looks the same at art fairs - very hygienic, very white, lots of right angles

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: As a viewer, I care about people, I care about characters, I care about perspective

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know of a more noble, a bigger deal as a filmmaker than to be a YouTube filmmaker

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I washed dishes so I could make movies. it was never a way for me to make money

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in the Northeast; I've seen hurricanes before and trees down and cars destroyed

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't drink much soda; I don't buy Big Gulps, and my body mass index is right where it should be

Quote.Author: Casey Neistat
Quote.QuoteValue: Troubleshooting a wiring problem is a soul-killing experience

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: Finding good players is easy. Getting them to play as a team is another story

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: The trick is growing up without growing old

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: Most ball games are lost, not won

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: No baseball pitcher would be worth a darn without a catcher who could handle the hot fastball

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: Been in this game one-hundred years, but I see new ways to lose 'em I never knew existed before

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: You gotta lose 'em some of the time. When you do, lose 'em right

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to have a catcher because if you don't you're likely to have a lot of passed balls

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: Without losers, where would the winners be?

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: The Mets have shown me more ways to lose than I even knew existed

Quote.Author: Casey Stengel
Quote.QuoteValue: The team has come along slow but fast

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're on a road trip, anything goes

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: You only feel as good as your last sketch

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Frankly, 'Bride Wars' got made because movies with women need to be about weddings and love

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom worked tirelessly on getting equal rights for women

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: Kenya Moore is everything to me. She's everything

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I use a method approach to all my sitcom work

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can have a laugh with someone, you're then in each other's world

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you have a sense of your place in the world, that's the best preparation for anything

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I can never turn my creativity off

Quote.Author: Casey Wilson
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll take discrimination if it's in my favor!

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that every state in the union should recognize same-sex marriage

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no proportional representation requirement in the Equal Protection Clause

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a huge Red Sox fan

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberals are sometimes defined as people who can't take their own side in an argument

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to get me out of the office

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's a regulation that's saving 10,000 lives and costing one job, it's worth it

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: For consumers, the lesson is simple: Genetically modified foods are safe to eat

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I confess I'm a big fan of Taylor Swift

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: In government, you're not a writer, you're an administrator

Quote.Author: Cass Sunstein
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm interested in how the Internet spreads information

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything I do is for the pleasure of Allah

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The very first lesson that I learnt from the Qur'an was the message of unity and peace

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: A person who steals bread during a famine is not treated as a thief

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: All things can be forgiven if we can progress

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: To be what you want to be, you must give up being what you are

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: There is a powerful need for people to feel that gust of hope rise up again

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Some extremists take elements of the sacred scriptures out of context

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: Communal well-being is central to human life

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: They have hijacked my religion

Quote.Author: Cat Stevens
Quote.QuoteValue: The words of the songs speak for themselves

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so misunderstood!

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really lazy!

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: When I have my moments of insomnia, you'll find me on style.com

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: For me, I think the bigger something is, the more difficult it is to make it nimble and fleet afoot

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: My everyday beauty routine is always rushed and pretty simple

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that a creative career is only as good as the risks that you take with it

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm scared of actors with a scheme

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: An actress once advised me, 'Make sure you do your own laundry - it will keep you honest.'

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of those strange beasts who really likes a corset

Quote.Author: Cate Blanchett
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're directing something, you absolutely have to be involved in all layers of the process

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I praise loudly. I blame softly

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Power without a nation's confidence is nothing

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I am one of the people who love the why of things

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: A great wind is blowing, and that gives you either imagination or a headache

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: All this is only for the mice and myself to admire!

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I beg you take courage; the brave soul can mend even disaster

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to praise and reward loudly, to blame quietly

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: I shall be an autocrat: that's my trade. And the good Lord will forgive me: that's his

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics a capable ruler must be guided by circumstances, conjectures and conjunctions

Quote.Author: Catherine the Great
Quote.QuoteValue: Men make love more intensely at 20, but make love better, however, at 30

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I get a bit gloomy when it's gloomy

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - Everyone knows we get paid a lot of money, so why pretend otherwise?

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I'd love to do a show in Vegas with drag queens. The tackier the better

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - Yes, I was in love with my husband at first sight and still am. We have the most solid relationship

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - My stepson is a caring, considerate, worthy human being

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I do a lot of swimming, both in the ocean and in the pool

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - Words impress me. If a man can speak eloquently and beautifully to me, I just melt on the floor

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I love my lawyer. I have to say that of course!

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - There are a lot of women who live with pot-bellied pigs

Quote.Author: Catherine Zet
Quote.QuoteValue: ones - I buy shoes sometimes and use them as bookends. They're too beautiful to wear

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: You got to try and reach for the stars or try and achieve the unreachable

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm in a bad mood, I don't listen

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Money makes life easier but I don't want to be rich, not at all

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so lucky. I have such a great support system. All I have to do is run

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I make no apologies

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: Peace, unity and harmony!

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing I do best is laugh

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely do things on my terms, it may not seem that way but I actually do

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: People could see in me who I am now, an Olympic champ, the best in the world

Quote.Author: Cathy Freeman
Quote.QuoteValue: I was always surrounded by expectation from the very first race I ran as a 5-year-old

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: It's hard to write a song about reality because reality doesn't rhyme

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: Women are our most miraculous muse, an enchanted intangibility that encourages all art

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I tend to like antique things. Something can be old, but it can be timeless

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: Like most artists, I live out of a suitcase

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I'll always be famous. I just hope I don't become infamous

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate hateful people

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an artist, and I like the risk - I'm not in it for the sure things

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I cry all the time. Music makes me cry

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I may sample at Pinkberry, but when I find a flavor I like, I'm pretty committed to it

Quote.Author: CeeLo Green
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a hell-fire temper

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if the camera likes me, but I do like the camera

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything that I decide to do means something, otherwise I don't do them

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I've never been cool - and I don't care

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: My kids give me the balance to live right

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be more successful as a mother than I am in show business

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I have become a housewife and there is no better job

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I often buy myself presents. Sometimes I will spend $100,000 in one day in a posh boutique

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to sing and perform. It is what I do and love. It completes my life

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I definitely would never go back to my 20s. The best is yet to come

Quote.Author: Celine Dion
Quote.QuoteValue: I was not a good-lookin' girl. I was extremely skinny. I wasn't pretty. I wasn't cool

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: The fight is never about grapes or lettuce. It is always about people

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: We draw our strength from the very despair in which we have been forced to live. We shall endure

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: You are never strong enough that you don't need help

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: In some cases non-violence requires more militancy than violence

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no such thing as defeat in non-violence

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: Preservation of one's own culture does not require contempt or disrespect for other cultures

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: The end of all knowledge should be service to others

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: To be a man is to suffer for others. God help us to be men!

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no law for farm labor organizing, save the law of the jungle

Quote.Author: Cesar Chavez
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to remember me, organize!

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: Just being with dogs, I learned their ways and began to appreciate things from their point of view

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: People say I train dogs, but in many ways I train people

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: I have never met a dog I couldn't help; however, I have met humans who weren't willing to change

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: America focuses on being very intelligent because that's how you make more money

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: It's an up and down thing, the human goals, because the human is always an explorer, an adventurist

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe a calm dog is a happy, obedient dog that won't get into trouble

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: No dog is too much for me to handle. I rehabilitate dogs, I train people. I am the dog whisperer

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: I wish my kid would act like my dog sometimes. My dog listens to me and does what I tell him to do

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm naturally a loud person. It can be a bit overpowering

Quote.Author: Cesar Millan
Quote.QuoteValue: Children are becoming disobedient... why, because of the lack of rules boundaries and limitations

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: We do not remember days, we remember moments

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: No one ever lacks a good reason for suicide

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: Give me the ready hand rather than the ready tongue

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: One must look for one thing only, to find many

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: The only joy in the world is to begin

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: The art of living is the art of knowing how to believe lies

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: The closing years of life are like the end of a masquerade party, when the masks are dropped

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: He knows not his own strength that hath not met adversity

Quote.Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote.QuoteValue: Love is the cheapest of religions

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is too short to miss out on the beautiful things like a double cheeseburger

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to work at a puppy nursery

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: But I'm not a tough guy or a street fighter for real. I'm just an actor

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: That's something I do, like, all the time. I just do backflips off things

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm thankful for weird people out there 'cause they're some of the most creative people

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: Actually I have a tradition that I always steal my last costume on the last day of filming

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: My mother taught me how to love. My mom is the most loving person I know

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: I did 'The Vow' because I really love being in love

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: Girls were always my biggest distraction in school

Quote.Author: Channing Tatum
Quote.QuoteValue: No one's calling me for lawyer roles. I still have a lot to do to prove myself

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: If I quit having fun, then it's time for me to quit working

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe if you write a great book, the chances are it'll get a great reception

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Silver, gold - I don't discriminate! I like sparkly things

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: People are really interested in the concept of eternal youth in this plastic-surgery culture

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: If it pleases you and you can write at all, it's gonna please somebody else

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't write the kind of 'happily ever after' that romance readers enjoy

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I certainly think we're going to see more and more graphic novels and more illustrated novels

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the cerebral process

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Very few of my characters are totally heroic or totally villainous

Quote.Author: Charlaine Harris
Quote.QuoteValue: Episcopalians are pretty thin on the ground in the central United States

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: A quality education grants us the ability to fight the war on ignorance and poverty

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: Encouragement of higher education for our youth is critical to the success of our collective future

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: We don't windsurf in Harlem

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: The Iraq war took priority over domestic disaster prevention

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: No one looks forward to a recount

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: Supporting mental wellness is crucial to any goal of decreasing gun violence in America

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: America was born as a nation of immigrants who have always contributed to its greatness

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't have Harlem become one borough for the rich

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am struck by how casually we as a nation react to the carnage in Iraq

Quote.Author: Charles B. Rangel
Quote.QuoteValue: The United States is historically a nation of immigrants

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes that light at the end of the tunnel is a train

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: The main thing to do is relax and let your talent do the work

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a role model... Just because I dunk a basketball doesn't mean I should raise your kids

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Somebody hits me, I'm going to hit him back. Even if it does look like he hasn't eaten in a while

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: You know it's going to hell when the best rapper out there is white and the best golfer is black

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that the team that wins game five will win the series. Unless we lose game five

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: The only difference between a good shot and a bad shot is if it goes in or not

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think of myself as giving interviews. I just have conversations. That gets me in trouble

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know what that gas is made of, but it can't smell any worse than Ernie Johnson 's gym bag

Quote.Author: Charles Barkley
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because you say something doesn't make it controversial, and it doesn't make you a bad person

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: The world only goes round by misunderstanding

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: To handle a language skillfully is to practice a kind of evocative sorcery

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Progress, this great heresy of decay

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: The poet enjoys the incomparable privilege of being able to be himself and others, as he wishes

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Any healthy man can go without food for two days - but not without poetry

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: There are as many kinds of beauty as there are habitual ways of seeking happiness

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing can be done except little by little

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Hypocrite reader my fellow my brother!

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: I have cultivated my hysteria with pleasure and terror

Quote.Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote.QuoteValue: Nature... is nothing but the inner voice of self-interest

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Some people never go crazy, What truly horrible lives they must live

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're losing your soul and you know it, then you've still got a soul left to lose

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want to know who your friends are, get yourself a jail sentence

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Bad taste creates many more millionaires than good taste

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: To do a dull thing with style-now that's what I call art

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: A cat is only itself, representative of the strong forces of life that won't let go

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Humanity, you never had it to begin with

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: It's possible to love a human being if you don't know them too well

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Joan of Arc had style. Jesus had style

Quote.Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote.QuoteValue: Never envy a man his lady. Behind it all lays a living hell

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Patience is the support of weakness; impatience the ruin of strength

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Next to acquiring good friends, the best acquisition is that of good books

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Imitation is the sincerest form of flattery

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Men's arguments often prove nothing but their wishes

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: The present time has one advantage over every other - it is our own

Quote.Author: Charles Caleb Colton
Quote.QuoteValue: Did universal charity prevail, earth would be a heaven, and hell a fable

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: A man's friendships are one of the best measures of his worth

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: The very essence of instinct is that it's followed independently of reason

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: How paramount the future is to the present when one is surrounded by children

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I love fools' experiments. I am always making them

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Man is descended from a hairy, tailed quadruped, probably arboreal in its habits

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Man tends to increase at a greater rate than his means of subsistence

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a cursed evil to any man to become as absorbed in any subject as I am in mine

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: Animals, whom we have made our slaves, we do not like to consider our equal

Quote.Author: Charles Darwin
Quote.QuoteValue: I have tried lately to read Shakespeare, and found it so intolerably dull that it nauseated me
